experiences.description: Development and design of front-end web applications in Vue JS and React focused mostly on healthcare and telemedicine. Maintenance and support of front-end web applications in Vue Js and ReactJs. Maintenance and support to NodeJS API's. Database management: Firebase (Firestore, Realtime Database), MongoDB, SQL Server. Integrations with communication tools for audio and video calls such as Twilio and Vonage.
Worked on an insurance project made with Python, more specifically using Flask, SQLAlchemy.
I developed a desktop application in Java for managing the clinical history of dental patients. I worked giving maintenance and support to a NodeJS API made with NestJS.

I developed and designed front-end web applications in Vue JS. I worked on Wordpress projects, creating pages and managing their content. I managed Firestore and Parse Server databases. I developed and implemented back-end applications using NodeJS and ExpressJS.
